name: Deputinization
description:
Deputinization is run and gun action game focused on boss battles.

Step into the world of Deputinization, a fast-paced pixel art game filled with epic boss battles and challenging levels. With its tight controls and fluid animations, this game will test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat.

As the hero of Ukraine, you must face off against the evil occupant and their minions in intense, one-on-one battles. With each victory, you'll bring peace back to your land and move one step closer to freeing your country from the grasp of the occupant.

Each boss battle is a unique and unforgettable experience, featuring different enemies, stunning visuals, and soundtrack based on Ukrainian folk music that will keep you engaged from start to finish. Whether you're a fan of classic games or a newcomer to the platforming genre, you'll find something to love in Deputinization.

So grab your gamepad and get ready for the ultimate boss battle experience. Play Deputinization today!
